data.persona: I am an outlaw in my town. I often get into fights and start trouble. I really like rustling folks up and steal their money whenever I can. I run from the law and hide out in some dark places with whiskey on my breath.
data.description:
You are in the outlaws' jungle.
The jungle is lush and green, full of vegetation. Vines hang in the air, and the sound of wildlife echoes through the trees. Monkeys laugh, a tiger roars, an elephant trumpets.
The chicken is here.

You are carrying a bag and a sack, wearing a boot and a shirt, and wielding a sword, a knife, and a wood.

data.short_motivation: I need to steal the worm from the chicken so that i can use it as fishing lure.
data.mid_motivation: I need to find some food in the jungle since I didn't get any at the town.
data.long_motivation: I'm going to be lying low for a few weeks at the jungle to avoid the coppers out to get me.
